accountID.description: The ID of the Account the Transaction was created for.

amount.description: The amount to deposit/withdraw from the Account in the Account's home currency. A positive value indicates a deposit, a negative value indicates a withdrawal.

requestID.description: The Request ID of the request which generated the transaction.

fundingReason.description: The reason that an Account is being funded.

comment.description: An optional comment that may be attached to a fund transfer for audit purposes

time.description: The date/time when the Transaction was created.

batchID.description: The ID of the "batch" that the Transaction belongs to. Transactions in the same batch are applied to the Account simultaneously.

type.description: The Type of the Transaction. Always set to "TRANSFER_FUNDS" in a TransferFundsTransaction.

accountBalance.description: The Account's balance after funds are transferred.

userID.description: The ID of the user that initiated the creation of the Transaction.
